children.text:
Putting this all together:

First, the Fortran program:

program atcoder_agc007_c
  implicit none
  double precision :: N, d, x, ans, adnum
  integer :: iostatus
  ! Read inputs
  read(*,*) N, d, x
  ans = 0.0d0
  do while (N > 0.5d0)
     adnum = d + x*(N - 0.5d0)
     ans = ans + adnum
     ! Update d and x
     d = (N + 1.0d0)*d / N + (5.0d0 * x)/(2.0d0 * N)
     x = (1.0d0 + (2.0d0 / N)) * x
     N = N - 1.0d0
  end do
  ! Now format and output
  !
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
Need to print with 20 decimal digits, with enough space for fraction digits up to 20

end program atcoder_agc007_c

children.text:
program atcoder_agc007_c
  implicit none
  double precision :: N, d, x, ans, adnum
  ! Read inputs: N, d, x
  read (*, *) N, d, x
  ans = 0.0d0
  do while (N > 0.5d0)
    adnum = d + x*(N - 0.5d0)
    ans = ans + adnum
    d = (N + 1.0d0) * d / N + (5.0d0 * x) / (2.0d0 * N)
    x = (1.0d0 + (2.0d0 / N)) * x
    N = N - 1.0d0
  end do
  !
